    • Constructor Detail

      • MacAddress

        public MacAddress(byte[] nodeMacAddress)
        Constructor to create DatalinkAddress property which contains the MAC address. The property will be attached to a Node.
        Parameters:
        nodeMacAddress - Data Link Address for the node in byte array format

      • MacAddress

        public MacAddress(java.lang.String nodeMacAddress)
        Constructor to create DatalinkAddress property which contains the MAC address. The property will be attached to a Node.
        Parameters:
        nodeMacAddress - Data Link Address for the node in String format
